entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming light in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
